public class BinarySearchTreeImpl
extends TreeImpl
implements BinarySearchTree<java.lang.Object>

Binary search tree class. Contains the InvaliTreeException subclass.

Tom O'Connell, Edit by: Weston Jossey- April 21, 2008

delete

private BinaryTreeNode delete(BinaryTreeNode node)
Deletes the data associated with the node specified

We have three cases:

    1. Node has no children (remove it)
    2. Node has 1 child (splice it out)
    3. Node has two childre (splice out its successor which has only 1 child)

Parameters:
node - the node whose data should be deleted from the tree
Returns:
returns the parent of the actual node that was spliced out of the tree.
